scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-auth0 && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
scripts.refresh: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-auth0 && tns plugin add ..
scripts.copy.android: cp *.js demo/node_modules/nativescript-auth0 && cp *.d.ts demo/node_modules/nativescript-auth0 && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.copy.ios: cp *.js demo/node_modules/nativescript-auth0 && cp *.d.ts demo/node_modules/nativescript-auth0 && cd demo && tns run ios
